name: ComfyUI-QualityOfLifeSuit
shortDescription: A comprehensive suite of quality-of-life nodes for ComfyUI, the powerful stable diffusion GUI. Featured in the ComfyUI ecosystem with 176 stars and 23 forks on GitHub.
description:
ComfyUI-QualityOfLifeSuit is a collection of custom nodes designed to enhance the ComfyUI experience for AI artists and developers. This toolkit provides essential utilities and workflow improvements for stable diffusion workflows.

With over 176 stars on GitHub, this project has become a valuable resource in the ComfyUI community, helping artists and developers streamline their creative workflows.
features: Custom nodes for enhanced workflow efficiency

name: HighStreet Metaverse
shortDescription: MMO metaverse platform with cross-platform web and VR support. Led architecture and systems design for large-scale multiplayer.
description: Led the architecture team for HighStreet's metaverse initiative. Designed and implemented networking infrastructure, matchmaking, and backend systems to support MMO-scale experiences. Built Unity DOTS-focused systems optimized for performance and cross-platform delivery.

name: Online Game Socket.io
shortDescription: Real-time multiplayer game framework with Unity client integration and authoritative server architecture.
description: A complete multiplayer framework featuring Unity client integration with Socket.io server. Includes examples of real-time synchronization, player interpolation, and authoritative server design.

name: Unreal Engine Game Collection
shortDescription: A collection of advanced Unreal Engine 5 projects showcasing multiplayer systems, combat mechanics, and modern C++ game development practices.
description: A comprehensive portfolio of Unreal Engine projects demonstrating proficiency in modern game development practices, including networked multiplayer, advanced combat systems, and level design.

subProjects.title: Battle Blaster
subProjects.description: A multiplayer shooter featuring advanced combat mechanics, weapon systems, and networked gameplay. Implements Unreal's replication system for seamless online play.

subProjects.title: ShooterSam
subProjects.description: Third-person shooter with sophisticated AI enemies, cover system, and dynamic difficulty adjustment.

subProjects.title: Dungeon Escape
subProjects.description: Atmospheric dungeon crawler combining puzzle-solving with action elements and procedural level generation.

name: Rhythm Attack VR
shortDescription: Award-winning VR rhythm game combining music, action, and innovative gameplay. ITI graduation project featuring custom art, music, and VFX - 100% original content.
description:
Rhythm Attack is an innovative VR rhythm game that merges music, action, and strategy. Players must defeat rhythm monsters by slicing projectiles to the beat, then attacking when enemies are vulnerable. The game features escalating difficulty that adapts to player performance.

This project was our graduation project from the ITI Game Development program, showcasing our skills across all aspects of game development including programming, art, music composition, and visual effects - all created entirely by our team.
features: Immersive VR gameplay with motion controls
Dynamic difficulty system that adapts to player skill

sections.title: Story Trailer
Gameplay Video

name: Estimation Kings
shortDescription: A polished multiplayer card game published on Google Play. Features online matchmaking, progression system, social features, and cross-platform play.
description:
Estimation Kings is a professionally published multiplayer card game that brings the popular Middle Eastern trick-taking game to mobile platforms. Built with Phaser.js and featuring robust server architecture for real-time multiplayer gameplay.

The game successfully launched on Google Play and attracted a dedicated player base with its smooth gameplay, social features, and competitive progression system.
features: Social features including friend system and chat
Multiple game environments and visual themes
Quick communication with emotes and preset messages

name: Unity Development Tools
shortDescription: A collection of professional Unity tools and frameworks including state machines, scriptable object systems, and UI optimization utilities used by developers worldwide.
description: Professional-grade Unity development tools and frameworks designed to streamline game development workflows. These open-source tools are used by developers globally and showcase advanced C# programming and Unity architecture patterns.

subProjects.title: SO State Machine
subProjects.description: Scriptable Object-based state machine system for clean, modular game logic. Features visual debugging and runtime state inspection.

subProjects.title: SO Events & Variables
subProjects.description: Event-driven architecture system using Scriptable Objects for decoupled communication between game systems.

subProjects.title: SO System
subProjects.description: Comprehensive Scriptable Object framework for data-driven game development with runtime and editor support.

subProjects.title: Optimized Unity Scroll List
subProjects.description: High-performance scroll list implementation with object pooling for handling thousands of UI elements smoothly.

name: Zinad Security Training Games
shortDescription: Suite of serious games for cybersecurity awareness training used by enterprise clients. Multi-platform solutions deployed to major organizations.
description: As Team Lead at Zinad, I spearheaded the development of a comprehensive suite of serious games designed to train employees in cybersecurity awareness. These games translate complex security concepts into engaging, interactive experiences used by major enterprise clients.
features: Engaging gameplay mechanics for learning retention

subProjects.title: Phishing Mania
subProjects.description: Interactive game teaching employees to identify phishing attempts through realistic email scenarios and immediate feedback.

subProjects.title: Who Will Be Millionaire - Security Edition
subProjects.description: Adaptation of the famous game show format focused on cybersecurity knowledge with multiplayer competition features.

subProjects.title: The Office VR
subProjects.description: Immersive VR experience where players identify and eliminate clean desk policy violations in a time-limited office environment.

subProjects.title: Password Ninja
subProjects.description: Fast-paced action game where players slash weak passwords and fake URLs in a ninja-themed environment.

subProjects.title: Security Archery VR
subProjects.description: VR archery game where players shoot arrows at correct answers to security questions in an engaging 3D environment.

name: VR Development Portfolio
shortDescription: Collection of VR projects demonstrating expertise in immersive technologies, including hackathon winners and training simulations.
description: A diverse portfolio of VR projects showcasing proficiency in virtual reality development across different platforms and use cases, from entertainment to training applications.

subProjects.title: VR Training Simulator
subProjects.description: Professional training simulation for industrial environments with realistic physics and interaction systems.

subProjects.title: VR Hackathon Project
subProjects.description: Award-winning hackathon project featuring innovative VR mechanics and collaborative gameplay.

subProjects.title: Beat Saber Clone
subProjects.description: Technical recreation of Beat Saber mechanics showcasing rhythm game development and VR interaction systems.

name: 3ashara Tawla
shortDescription: Modern take on the classic Middle Eastern backgammon game featuring online multiplayer, advanced AI, and extensive customization options.
description:
3ashara Tawla is a comprehensive online multiplayer game based on Middle Eastern backgammon rules. The game features two distinct modes: 'Ma7bosa' and 'Thirteen', each offering unique gameplay experiences.

With sophisticated AI opponents, extensive character customization, and various game modes, 3ashara Tawla aims to be the definitive digital version of this beloved traditional game.
features: Two unique game modes: Ma7bosa and Thirteen
Advanced AI with multiple difficulty levels

name: Web Game Development
shortDescription: Modern web-based game projects utilizing WebGL, Three.js, and custom game engines. Includes multiplayer frameworks and game server architecture.
description: A collection of web game projects demonstrating full-stack game development capabilities, from custom JavaScript game engines to real-time multiplayer server architecture.

subProjects.title: Custom JavaScript Game Engine
subProjects.description: Native JavaScript game engine built from scratch featuring entity-component system, physics, and collision detection.

subProjects.title: Socket.io Game Server
subProjects.description: Real-time multiplayer game server supporting fast-paced online games with optimized networking and state synchronization.

subProjects.title: WebGL Demo Projects
subProjects.description: Interactive 3D web experiences showcasing advanced WebGL techniques and Three.js integration.
